content.raw:
I am having Segmentation Faults from gazebo.

```
Segmentation fault (core dumped)[gazebo_gui-3] process has died [pid 19594, exit code 139, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzclient --verbose __name:=gazebo_gui __log:=/home/tylerlum/.ros/log/e0ba648a-b890-11e9-87fd-dcfb48e97aeb/gazebo_gui-3.log].log file: /home/tylerlum/.ros/log/e0ba648a-b890-11e9-87fd-dcfb48e97aeb/gazebo_gui-3*.log
```
